KSLU_LO_TYPE.DESCR: LO created by external organization, e.g., state or accrediting organization
KSLU_LO_TYPE.NAME: Externally-created

KSLU_LO_TYPE.DESCR: LO created as part of an established, "official" curriculum or program, typically requires separate approval process to add to hierarchy
KSLU_LO_TYPE.NAME: Formal

KSLU_LO_TYPE.DESCR: LO created in support of programs or courses, e.g., faculty-inspired additional LO for a course
KSLU_LO_TYPE.NAME: singleUse
